3. The team "Portuguesa" has also played 16 games as shown in the "played" column under its corresponding row.
4. Compare the number of games played by both teams, Corinthians (17) and Portuguesa (16).
5. Since Corinthians has played one more game than Portuguesa, it can be concluded that Corinthian play more games in this season.

We can do this by looking at the "points" column and finding the row where the points are lower than any team listed above. In this case, Portuguesa is in position 8 (row index 7).

5. Check the "drawn" column for Portuguesa's position (row 7) to find out how many games they have tied. For Portuguesa, it is 2.

6. Compare the number of ties for Corinthians (1) and Portuguesa (2). Since 2 is greater than 1, the claim would be false.
